parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Animations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> When used on a person, the given action is started immediately (there is no transition). Use switchmove "" to switch back to the default movement if there is no transition back, otherwise the person may be stuck.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> soldier '''switchAction''' action

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soldier: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> action: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>soldierOne [[switchAction]] "SitDown"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[playAction]], [[playActionNow]], [[switchMove]]
</value></part></template>
